def process_nested_list(lst):
    for sublist in lst:
        if len(sublist) > 3:
            extra = sum(sublist[3:])
            sublist[2] += extra
            del sublist[3:]
    return lst

nested_list = [[1, 2], [3, 4, 4, 3, 1], [4, 1, 4, 5]]
print(process_nested_list(nested_list))
